attributes.action: Protect the UK’s emergent lap dancing clubs, allow fans continued access, and not licence or regulate clubs out of existence, out of fear of moral crusaders who do not approve of sensual entertainment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petitioners undersigned, do not wish government policy to make clubs harder to licence and operate. Clubs provide much needed sensual relief to citizens, and much needed employment to staff. Police officers have gone on record appreciating the model behaviour of citizens outside such clubs.  Any regulatory change to force closures and prevent new openings will not be popular with these clubs’ legions of fans.
